charges.charge_description: Knowingly and intentionally did unlawfully conspire, combine, confederate and agree together and with each other to possess with intent to distribute in excess of 5 kilograms of cocaine hydrochloride a schedule II narcotics controlled substance, within the meaning of 21:846, 841(b)(1)(a)
